song_name: Sittin' On The Dock of the Bay
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Sittin' On The Dock of the Bay is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Sittin' On The Dock of the Bay has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and G Lydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
